document_data.name: Heldatha Dhussta
document_data.mainbody: '''Heldatha Dhussta''' was a female [[human]] and a [[Painbearer]] of [[Ilmater]]. She was the Revered Mother of the House at the [[Towers of Willful Suffering]] in [[Eshpurta]], [[Amn]], in the [[1367 DR|Year of the Shield, 1367 DR]]
